thread.title: Former Broncos offensive coordinator Rick Dennison set to become Buffalo Bills OC
thread.title_full: Former Broncos offensive coordinator Rick Dennison set to become Buffalo Bills OC

author: The Associated Press
title: Former Broncos offensive coordinator Rick Dennison set to become Buffalo Bills OC
text: Falconsâ€™ Kyle Shanahan will have another meeting with San Francisco 49ers January 19, 2017, 5:15 pm Kyle Shanahan plans to talk again with the San Francisco 49ers about their head coaching vacancy, with all signs pointing to the Atlanta Falcons offensive coordinator landing the job. Brady, Roethlisberger, Ryan and Rodgers: Breaking down the final 4 quarterbacks January 19, 2017, 4:18 pm These guys are not perfect, though. They make mistakes. And chances are, one or more will do so again this weekend. Garett Bolles to Broncos? Mel Kiper has Denver selecting Utah OT in mock draft. January 19, 2017, 3:08 pm Mel Kiper Jr. released his first mock draft and he has the Broncos attacking that offensive-line need in the first round with Utah offensive tackle Garett Bolles at pick No. 20. Broncos expected to hire Johnnie Lynn as assistant DBs coach January 19, 2017, 12:56 pm Johnnie Lynn was a defensive backs coach with Vance Joseph in San Francisco and was most recently a coach with the Raiders.
